about_the_game:
Mossroot is a party-based tactical RPG Roguelike. Climb up a fortified mountain. Fight bandits, knights, cavemen and more. Power up your team, make hard decisions, recruit enemies to help fight against tyranny. Bring them to your Homebase, get to know them and build a safe haven together.


Fight Your Way to the Top

Take down the Evil King! Climb his treacherous mountain, travel through varied dangerous biomes, each with their own cadre of monsters, bandits, and potential allies. Find treasures in each fight: runes that will power up your teammates, and items like bombs and potions you can use to fight your foes. No run is exactly the same, the map up the mountain is procedurally generated.



Make Difficult Decisions

You'll make pitstops on your way up the hill. Some are simply places to catch your breath, but watch out, others will force you to make important decisions. Are you willing to sacrifice on strength to increase another? The choices you make will decide how easy your attempt is.



Recruit Your Enemies

Not everyone you face is a bad guy. Recruit sympathetic souls to your cause by finding what they want and fulfilling it. Each new unit has their own special powers they can use, some synergising with each other, creating different teams to build and new ways to play the game.



Build a Safe Haven Together

Bring your new recruits back to your homebase, a village destroyed by war. Talk to them, learn their life, and rebuild the town together. As you grow in size, you'll find merchants and other services that will help your runs become easier, or even harder, with greater reward.

Features:
  • Over 15 playable characters
  • 4 different biomes, each with a wide variety of enemies
  • a homebase that grows with you
  • Options to make your runs easier or harder

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 2.0 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 640 x 416 pixels or higher desktop resolution

short_description: Mossroot is a party-based tactical-RPG Roguelike. Fight against a monstrous King! Climb the mountain, Increase your power, make dangerous bargains with unknown sources. Recruit allies to help fight against tyranny. Bring them to your Home, Build it to gain more power, and climb again!
